name: Oceano County Campground
desc: Located along the coast, Oceano offers beach access and sand dune adventures.

name: Coastal Dunes RV Park and Campground
desc: A popular RV-friendly spot with coastal breezes and walking access to dunes.

name: El Chorro Regional Park & Campground
desc: Known for hiking trails, botanical gardens, and proximity to Cuesta Grade.

name: Lopez Lake
desc: Great for water activities and family camping near a scenic reservoir.

name: Santa Margarita Lake
desc: Serene, wooded setting ideal for kayaking, wildlife viewing, and secluded camping.
